message.content: {"given_definition_quality":35,"better_definition":"to run or move quickly on foot","sentence":"小学生跑。","image_prompt":"A young primary school student (HSK1 小学生) in simple clothing, running with a lively expression outdoors. The scene has a soft apocalypse animation style: gentle pastel tones, subtle hints of an overgrown, slightly abandoned city in the background, but with a peaceful atmosphere. The child is energetically in motion, leaving a faint blur behind to show speed. Streets are cracked, some grass growing through, and soft morning light gently illuminates the scene.","sentence_translation":"The primary school student runs."}
